mapper.insert: insert into share_article (user_id, plan_id, title, content, hit, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{planId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select: SELECT sa.article_no AS articleNo, sa.user_id AS userId, sa.plan_id AS planId, sa.title, sa.content, ssa.hit, sa.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(sl.article_no) AS likeCnt FROM share_article sa LEFT JOIN share_like sl ON sa.article_no = sl.article_no GROUP BY sa.article_no, sa.user_id, sa.plan_id, sa.title, sa.content, sa.hit, sa.created_at;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT sa.article_no AS articleNo, sa.user_id AS userId, sa.plan_id AS planId, sa.title, sa.content, sa.hit, sa.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(sl.article_no) AS likeCnt FROM share_article sa LEFT JOIN share_like sl ON sa.article_no = sl.article_no GROUP BY sa.article_no, sa.user_id, sa.plan_id, sa.title, sa.content, sa.hit, sa.created_at) a where a.articleNo = #{articleNo}
